parameters.query:
WITH existing AS (
  SELECT id FROM contacts WHERE lower(email) = lower($1) ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 1
),
updated AS (
  UPDATE contacts
  SET
    full_name = COALESCE(NULLIF($2, ''), contacts.full_name),
    preferred_lang = COALESCE(NULLIF($3, ''), contacts.preferred_lang),
    timezone = COALESCE(NULLIF($4, ''), contacts.timezone),
    updated_at = NOW()
  WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM existing)
  RETURNING id
),
inserted AS (
  INSERT INTO contacts (email, full_name, preferred_lang, timezone)
  SELECT $1, NULLIF($2, ''), NULLIF($3, ''), NULLIF($4, '')
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM existing)
  RETURNING id
)
SELECT COALESCE((SELECT id FROM updated), (SELECT id FROM inserted)) AS contact_id;

options.queryReplacement: ={{ [ $('1. Normalize Payload').item.json.email, $('1. Normalize Payload').item.json.full_name ?? '', $('1. Normalize Payload').item.json.preferred_lang ?? 'ru', $('1. Normalize Payload').item.json.timezone ?? '' ] }}

parameters.query:
WITH payload AS (
  SELECT
    $1::uuid AS contact_id,
    $2::int AS source_id,
    $3::text AS status,
    $4::text AS unsubscribe_token,
    $5::text AS dedupe_key,
    $6::text AS consent_version,
    $7::boolean AS double_opt_in_required
),
existing AS (
  SELECT
    ns.id,
    ns.status AS previous_status,
    ns.confirmed_at AS previous_confirmed_at
  FROM newsletter_subscribers ns
  JOIN payload p ON p.contact_id = ns.contact_id
),
updated AS (
  UPDATE newsletter_subscribers ns
  SET
    source_id = payload.source_id,
    status = payload.status,
    unsubscribe_token = payload.unsubscribe_token,
    dedupe_key = payload.dedupe_key,
    consent_version = payload.consent_version,
    double_opt_in_required = payload.double_opt_in_required,
    confirmed_at = CASE
      WHEN payload.double_opt_in_required THEN ns.confirmed_at
      ELSE NOW()
    END,
    unsubscribed_at = CASE
      WHEN payload.status = 'unsubscribed' THEN COALESCE(ns.unsubscribed_at, NOW())
      ELSE NULL
    END,
    updated_at = NOW()
  FROM payload
  WHERE ns.contact_id = payload.contact_id
  RETURNING ns.id, ns.contact_id, ns.status, ns.unsubscribe_token, ns.double_opt_in_required, ns.confirmed_at, ns.unsubscribed_at, ns.updated_at,
    (SELECT previous_status FROM existing) AS previous_status,
    (SELECT previous_confirmed_at FROM existing) AS previous_confirmed_at,
    FALSE AS is_new
),
inserted AS (
  INSERT INTO newsletter_subscribers (contact_id, source_id, status, unsubscribe_token, dedupe_key, consent_version, double_opt_in_required, confirmed_at)
  SELECT
    payload.contact_id,
    payload.source_id,
    payload.status,
    payload.unsubscribe_token,
    payload.dedupe_key,
    payload.consent_version,
    payload.double_opt_in_required,
    CASE WHEN payload.double_opt_in_required THEN NULL ELSE NOW() END
  FROM payload
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM existing)
  RETURNING id, contact_id, status, unsubscribe_token, double_opt_in_required, confirmed_at, NULL::timestamptz AS unsubscribed_at, NOW() AS updated_at, NULL::subscriber_status AS previous_status, NULL::timestamptz AS previous_confirmed_at, TRUE AS is_new
)
SELECT * FROM inserted
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM updated;

options.queryReplacement: ={{ [ $('4. Assemble Context').item.json.contact_id, $('4. Assemble Context').item.json.source_id, $('4. Assemble Context').item.json.subscriber_status, $('4. Assemble Context').item.json.unsubscribe_token, $('4. Assemble Context').item.json.dedupe_key, $('4. Assemble Context').item.json.consent_version, $('4. Assemble Context').item.json.double_opt_in ] }}

parameters.query: SELECT subject_template, body_template FROM templates WHERE name = $1;
SELECT subject_template, body_template FROM templates WHERE name = $1;
